title: Keir Starmer – 2021 Comments on Boris Johnson and Coal Mine Statement
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 6 August 2021.
content:
The Prime Minister has shown his true colours yet again.
